name: css-word-break
description: Css module of single purpose classes for word break

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-word-break.css > css/css-word-break.css && tachyons src/css-word-break.css --minify > css/css-word-break.min.css && tachyons src/css-word-break.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
